activities: Shure Incorporated operates one or more wholly owned (directly or indirectly) subsidaries in the European Union which provide sales, distribution and repair services for Shure products throughout Europe.  Thus, Shure Incorporated receives certain information related to such sales, distribution and repair service activities conducted by such subsidiaries, as well as certain human resource information related to employees of such subsidiaries.
contacttitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed data and human resources data
recoursemech: Compliance with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution and commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs), government supervisory authorities or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (Swiss DPAs), or their authorized representatives.
